forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with occasional rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Windy with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 58F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers along with windy conditions. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers along with windy conditions. Low 51F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
